Ingest_LDD.name: KPLO
Ingest_LDD.comment: The KPLO dictionary contains classes that describe aspects of the Korea Pathfinder Lunar Orbiter mission and related instruments.

DD_Attribute.name: bias_spread
DD_Attribute.definition: Difference between the max and min bias 12-bit DN value for the whole image.

DD_Attribute.name: bias_spread_ch0
DD_Attribute.definition: Difference between the max and min bias 12-bit DN value for channel 0.

DD_Attribute.name: bias_spread_ch1
DD_Attribute.definition: Difference between the max and min bias 12-bit DN value for channel 1.

DD_Attribute.name: bias_spread_ch2
DD_Attribute.definition: Difference between the max and min bias 12-bit DN value for channel 2.

DD_Attribute.name: bias_spread_ch3
DD_Attribute.definition: Difference between the max and min bias 12-bit DN value for channel 3.

DD_Attribute.name: bias_spread_ch4
DD_Attribute.definition: Difference between the max and min bias 12-bit DN value for channel 4.

DD_Attribute.name: bias_spread_ch5
DD_Attribute.definition: Difference between the max and min bias 12-bit DN value for channel 5.

DD_Attribute.name: bit_selection
DD_Attribute.definition: LUTI A bit selection flag

DD_Attribute.name: bterm1
DD_Attribute.definition: ShadowCam companding bterm 1 (See appendix in the ShadowCam archive SIS for detailed companding information)

DD_Attribute.name: bterm2
DD_Attribute.definition: ShadowCam companding bterm 2 (See appendix in the ShadowCam archive SIS for detailed companding information)

DD_Attribute.name: bterm3
DD_Attribute.definition: ShadowCam companding bterm 3 (See appendix in the ShadowCam archive SIS for detailed companding information)

DD_Attribute.name: bterm4
DD_Attribute.definition: ShadowCam companding bterm 4 (See appendix in the ShadowCam archive SIS for detailed companding information)

DD_Attribute.name: bterm5
DD_Attribute.definition: ShadowCam companding bterm 5 (See appendix in the ShadowCam archive SIS for detailed companding information)

DD_Attribute.name: ccd_direction
DD_Attribute.definition: Direction of the recording CCD defined for LUTI A.

DD_Attribute.name: data_quality_desc
DD_Attribute.definition: Describes how to interpret the data_quality_id field.

DD_Attribute.name: data_quality_id
DD_Attribute.definition: LROC-style data quality ID bitmask with minimal differences between ShadowCam and LROC definitions. See data_quality_desc for details. The individual boolean fields (dqi_*) are likely easier to use for new software.

DD_Attribute.name: dqi_corruption_detected
DD_Attribute.definition: The corruption detection algorithm found a strong likelihood of image corruption somewhere in the observation. This is often localized to a small area, leaving most of the image usable.

DD_Attribute.name: dqi_fpa_out_of_bounds
DD_Attribute.definition: The focal plane temperature was outside of the nominal operational limits. The calibration of the image is likely to not be as good in this case.

DD_Attribute.name: dqi_missing_data
DD_Attribute.definition: One or more 1 MiB data blocks are missing from the image. Due to interleaving, this typically results in a pattern of 4 pixels present 4 pixels missing.

DD_Attribute.name: dqi_missing_spice
DD_Attribute.definition: SPICE was unavailable for this observation.

DD_Attribute.name: dqi_uncalibratable
DD_Attribute.definition: This observation could not be calibrated.

DD_Attribute.name: dqi_under_saturated
DD_Attribute.definition: One or more 0 DN values are present in the companded 8-bit DN.

DD_Attribute.name: execution_spacecraft_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The spacecraft time of when the image command was executed. Use this time with the SCLK kernel and add the start_time_offset value for the most accurate image start.

DD_Attribute.name: execution_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The UTC time and date at the execution of the image acquisition command. Add the start time offset to this time to get the start of the image data. Use the spacecraft clock version of the time with an SCLK kernel for the most accurate timing.

DD_Attribute.name: frame_id
DD_Attribute.definition: Records if the image was LUTI A

DD_Attribute.name: gain_ch0
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end gain for channel 0. See ShadowCam calibration paper for details on the gain correction.

DD_Attribute.name: gain_ch1
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end gain for channel 1. See ShadowCam calibration paper for details on the gain correction.

DD_Attribute.name: gain_ch2
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end gain for channel 2. See ShadowCam calibration paper for details on the gain correction.

DD_Attribute.name: gain_ch3
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end gain for channel 3. See ShadowCam calibration paper for details on the gain correction.

DD_Attribute.name: gain_ch4
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end gain for channel 4. See ShadowCam calibration paper for details on the gain correction.

DD_Attribute.name: gain_ch5
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end gain for channel 4. See ShadowCam calibration paper for details on the gain correction.

DD_Attribute.name: klines
DD_Attribute.definition: The number of 1024-line image chunks commanded (includes preroll).

DD_Attribute.name: line_integration_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The line integration time in milliseconds.

DD_Attribute.name: line_rate_code
line_rate_ms
DD_Attribute.definition: The TDI line rate in milliseconds, the effective exposure time is multiplied by 32 for the number of TDI stages.

DD_Attribute.name: luti_constant_time_offset
DD_Attribute.definition: Constant time offset for LUTI A and B in seconds.

DD_Attribute.name: luti_target_id
DD_Attribute.definition: LUTI target ID.

DD_Attribute.name: mission_phase_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The mission_phase_name attribute provides the mission-defined name of a time period within the mission.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Within normal or nominal mission goals
Extended mission phase past end of nomial mission

DD_Attribute.name: mode_test
DD_Attribute.definition: The instrument was commanded in test mode, resulting in a gradient rather than image data.

DD_Attribute.name: offset_ch0
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end offset for channel 0.

DD_Attribute.name: offset_ch1
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end offset for channel 1.

DD_Attribute.name: offset_ch2
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end offset for channel 2.

DD_Attribute.name: offset_ch3
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end offset for channel 3.

DD_Attribute.name: offset_ch4
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end offset for channel 4.

DD_Attribute.name: offset_ch5
DD_Attribute.definition: The analog front end offset for channel 5.

DD_Attribute.name: orbit_number
DD_Attribute.definition: The orbit_number attribute identifies the number of the orbital revolution of the spacecraft around the Moon.

DD_Attribute.name: pre_scan_mode_selection
DD_Attribute.definition: pre-scan defined mode selection for LUTI A

DD_Attribute.name: preroll_lines
DD_Attribute.definition: The number of image lines dropped to initialize the TDI sensor. Typically, this is a minimum of 256.

DD_Attribute.name: preroll_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The UTC time and date at the start of the image acquisition, corresponding to the acquisition of preroll_lines at the given exposure prior to the actual image acquisition.

DD_Attribute.name: producer_institution_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The producer_institution_name attribute identifies a university, research center, NASA center, or other institution associated with the production of a data product.

DD_Attribute.name: product_version_id
DD_Attribute.definition: A version specifier to differentiate how the data was processed.

DD_Attribute.name: rationale_desc
DD_Attribute.definition: Any available commentary on the goal of the observation. This is created at planning time, and specific instrument and spacecraft performance may impact if the resulting image meets the original goal or not.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_start_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The spacecraft_clock_start_count attribute provides the value of the spacecraft clock at the beginning of a time period of interest.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_stop_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The spacecraft_clock_stop_count attribute provides the value of the spacecraft clock at the beginning of a time period of interest.

DD_Attribute.name: start_time_offset
DD_Attribute.definition: The time in seconds after the execution time that the first image row started. Use this with execution_spacecraft_time and the KPLO SCLK kernel to get the best available start of the image data.

DD_Attribute.name: tdi_direction
DD_Attribute.definition: The TDI direction of the sensor (A or B). This must match the flight direction of the spacecraft except for calibration images.

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_fpa_a
DD_Attribute.definition: The temperature of the ‘A’ sensor adjacent to the focal plane. This sensor is located on the heat strap going to the radiator and is the primary temperature used for calibration.

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_fpa_b
DD_Attribute.definition: The temperature of the ‘B’ sensor adjacent to the focal plane. This sensor is on the opposite side of the TDI sensor from ‘A’, but is not on the copper strap.

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_fpga
DD_Attribute.definition: The temperature reported on the electronics board adjacent to the FPGA.

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_telescope
DD_Attribute.definition: The temperature reported from the metering structure of the telescope.

DD_Attribute.name: xterm0
DD_Attribute.definition: ShadowCam companding xterm 0 (See appendix in the ShadowCam archive SIS for detailed companding information)

DD_Attribute.name: xterm1
DD_Attribute.definition: ShadowCam companding xterm 1 (See appendix in the ShadowCam archive SIS for detailed companding information)

DD_Attribute.name: xterm2
DD_Attribute.definition: ShadowCam companding xterm 2 (See appendix in the ShadowCam archive SIS for detailed companding information)

DD_Attribute.name: xterm3
DD_Attribute.definition: ShadowCam companding xterm 3 (See appendix in the ShadowCam archive SIS for detailed companding information)

DD_Attribute.name: xterm4
DD_Attribute.definition: ShadowCam companding xterm 4 (See appendix in the ShadowCam archive SIS for detailed companding information)

DD_Class.name: SHADOWCAM_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The SHADOWCAM_Parameters class is the container for ShadowCam-specific observation parameters.

DD_Class.name: LUTI_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The LUTI_Parameters class is the container for Lunar Terrain Imager A and B specific observation parameters.

DD_Class.name: KPLO_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The KPLO_Parameters class is the container for mission-specific metadata elements.
